nodes.description: ISIS宣称对2017年5月22日曼彻斯特体育馆袭击负责，称袭击者为‘哈里发国士兵’
nodes.support_text: Isis has claimed responsibility for the Manchester Arena attack, hailing the bomber as a 'soldier of the caliphate'.

nodes.description: ISIS通过多语言声明赞扬袭击，声称造成100名‘十字军’伤亡，并指责英国‘亵渎穆斯林土地’
nodes.support_text: The terrorist group released statements in several languages through its central media body praising the atrocity, claiming more than 100 'crusaders' were killed or wounded at the 'shameless' concert.

nodes.description: 曼彻斯特警方确认袭击发生在Ariana Grande演唱会结束后，22人死亡、数十人受伤
nodes.support_text: The blast killed 22 people and injured dozens more at an Ariana Grande concert on Monday night.

nodes.description: Greater Manchester Police证实袭击者为携带自制爆炸装置的‘独狼’，袭击者当场死亡
nodes.support_text: Ian Hopkins, the Chief Constable of Greater Manchester Police, said investigators believe the attack was carried out by a lone suicide bomber ‘carrying’ a homemade device.

nodes.description: ISIS声明称袭击非自杀式，未将袭击者称为‘殉教者’，并暗示与组织有直接联系
nodes.support_text: It suggested the atrocity was not a suicide attack, despite police statements saying the perpetrator died at the scene, and did not name him as a 'martyr'.

nodes.description: 支持者传播未经验证的英文视频，但分析发现旗帜与ISIS标志不符且未提及组织名称
nodes.support_text: The group's supporters had been circulating an unverified video claiming to show a masked English-speaking militant claiming responsibility for the Manchester attack. analysts pointed out that a flag positioned behind the man was not the symbol most commonly associated with Isis, which he did not refer to by its usual name.

nodes.description: Theresa May总理将袭击定性为‘扭曲而畸形’，感谢救援人员并确认警方已锁定嫌疑人
nodes.support_text: Theresa May calls Manchester bombing ‘warped and twisted’

nodes.description: 至少一名23岁男子在曼彻斯特被捕，MI5总监谴责袭击‘令人厌恶’
nodes.support_text: At least one 23-year-old man was arrested in Manchester, MI5 director condemned the attack ‘as abhorrent’.

edges.support_text: The terrorist group released statements in several languages through its central media body praising the atrocity...
It suggested the atrocity was not a suicide attack...
Theresa May calls Manchester bombing ‘warped and twisted’
The group's supporters had been circulating an unverified video claiming to show a masked English-speaking militant claiming responsibility for the Manchester attack.
Greater Manchester Police have confirmed 19 fatalities and at least 50 injured.
Ian Hopkins, the Chief Constable of Greater Manchester Police, said investigators believe the attack was carried out by a lone suicide bomber ‘carrying’ a homemade device.
At least one 23-year-old man was arrested in Manchester, MI5 director condemned the attack ‘as abhorrent’.
Ian Hopkins的表演事件应早于ISIS宣称责任
MI5 DG声明应早于ISIS多语言声明
MI5员工震惊应早于袭击事件确认
